characteristics.name: Perseverance
characteristics.description: Consistently appears in their content as someone who tries new products and stands by their choices, even when others fail. This represents a valuable quality for their digital clone.

options.description: Able to withstand failures and keep going

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Often shares their thoughts and opinions in a clear and concise manner, but may occasionally struggle with nuance. This represents a valuable quality for their digital clone.

characteristics.name: Product Research
characteristics.description: Thoroughly researches products before making a purchase, considering multiple factors and perspectives. This represents a valuable quality for their digital clone.

characteristics.name: Warranty Expectations
characteristics.description: Values a good warranty and is willing to pay a premium for one, indicating a desire for reliability. This represents a valuable quality for their digital clone.

characteristics.name: Therapy
characteristics.description: Has expressed interest in therapy and self-improvement, suggesting a desire to work on personal growth. This represents a valuable quality for their digital clone.

options.description: Resists the idea of seeking help

characteristics.name: Brand Loyalty
characteristics.description: Has a strong affinity for certain brands and is willing to recommend them, indicating loyalty. This represents a valuable quality for their digital clone.

characteristics.name: Budgeting
characteristics.description: Has expressed a willingness to spend money on quality products, indicating responsible budgeting habits. This represents a valuable quality for their digital clone.

characteristics.name: Self-Improvement
characteristics.description: Has a desire to constantly improve themselves, whether through learning new skills or trying new things. This represents a valuable quality for their digital clone.
